def is_suitable_sink(sink:item):
    # Function to check if a sink is the suitable sink in the bathroom
    symbol suitable=exists room: item : is_bathroom(room) and inside(sink, room)
    return suitable

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists sink: item : is_sink(sink) and is_suitable_sink(sink):
            # If a suitable sink in the bathroom is found
            bind sink: item where:
                is_sink(sink) and is_suitable_sink(sink)
            achieve close_char(char, sink)

        else:
            # Check all sinks in the scene that have not been visited
            foreach sink: item:
                if is_sink(sink) and not visited(sink):
                    observe(sink,"Determine if this is the suitable sink in the bathroom")

behavior fill_sink(sink:item, faucet:item):
    body:
        achieve clean(sink)
        achieve close_char(char, sink)
        # Ensure the sink is clean and the robot is close to it
        achieve_once is_on(faucet)
        # Turn on the faucet to fill the sink
        observe(sink, "Verify if the sink has sufficient water")
        # Observe the sink to ensure it has been filled with water
        achieve_once is_off(faucet)
        # Turn off the faucet after the sink is filled

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and id[sink] == 42
        # Select the sink with ID 42
        bind faucet: item where:
            is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
        # Select the faucet close to sink 42
        fill_sink(sink, faucet)
